result.title: Calculate area of feasible region of a Linear Programming Model
result.content:
Hello Codeforces Community!

My professor gave this problem as a challenge to us, but no one could solve it. Can anyone come up with a solution?

Given N constraints, then what would the total area of the feasible region of the comprising Linear Programming Model?

Note: All the constraints are of the form ax+by+c >= 0

N <= 10^6

I came up with something that used Convex Hull Algorithm, but couldn't develop over the idea much.

Thanks :)
